definition: lit. to go beyond the sacrificial altar and take over the kitchen (idiom); fig. to exceed one's place and meddle in other people's affairs/to take matters into one's own hands
generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more
a stand for food at sacrifice
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
kitchen

sentences.english: If done right, can take over.
sentences.chinese: 即使做的對的，也不能越俎代庖。

sentences.english: You can't make someone else's choices. You shouldn't let someone else make yours.
sentences.chinese: 你無法替別人做決定，亦不可讓別人替你越俎代庖。

sentences.english: Right now, exceed one's duties and meddle in others' affairs of toxic lead plane, had the effect of default gateway.
sentences.chinese: 此時，中毒主機越俎代庖，起了缺省網關的作用。

sentences.english: In truth, the legal establishment's authority in this area is misplaced.
sentences.chinese: 法律部門在這個問題上實際上是越俎代庖了。

sentences.english: But I can do your mother on your father's behalf.
sentences.chinese: 但是是和你媽媽睡覺的那個人，爲你爸爸越俎代庖了。

definition: to go beyond one's authority/arrogation
to take complete charge (idiom)
to stand aside and do nothing (idiom)/to take no part in
to usurp/to overstep one's authority
to do sth in place of sb else
to think for oneself and act accordingly (idiom); to act on one's own initiative
to get involved in/to meddle/interference
to do everything oneself (idiom); not to allow others in on the act
to force someone to do something
see 作主[zuo4 zhu3]
to blame unscrupulously
to gesticulate while talking (idiom); to explain by waving one's hands/to criticize or give orders summarily/also written 指手畫腳|指手画脚
to offer an opinion/to comment (on the issue)/to have a say (in the matter)
to gesticulate while talking (idiom)/to explain by waving one's hands/to criticize or give orders summarily
to delegate power/to decentralize
to act arbitrarily/to make decisions without consulting others
